personal.name: Avinash
personal.title: Front-end Developer
personal.description: I'm a self-taught front-end developer based in Kyiv, Ukraine. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and raise them into modern user-friendly web experiences.
personal.passion: Transforming my creativity and knowledge into a websites has been my passion for over a year. I have been helping various clients to establish their presence online. I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.
